article.h1: Lucene Solr Expert Consulting Services and Tech Support
article.p: Tokenizer Inc. provides expert consulting for Lucene, Solr, and related technology frameworks such as LingPipe, GATE, WEKA, Mahout, Cassandra, HBase, Hadoop, MapReduce, focused on architecture and design reviews, performance optimization and best practices. The Tokenizer Inc. consulting team consists of senior technologists intimately familiar with Lucene/Solr and many other technologies, with extensive experience in field-tested search solutions in diverse deployment scenarios.

By leveraging Tokenizer's deep domain expertise, you can achieve rapid transfer of knowledge on Lucene and Solr technologies, faster application development cycles, and assurance of utilizing well tested architectural design principles. Our customers also gain economic efficiencies by avoiding lengthy ramp-up times and costly design errors due to inexperience.
The majority of consulting activities are conducted remotely to maintain cost-effectiveness.

Key to the success of any search application is ensuring that the architectural design and configuration are grounded in best practices and align with the business and functional requirements. Tokenizer Inc. Enterprise Solution Architects can provide advice and recommendations for rapid and optimal development as well as deployment that ensure that:

ul.li: Your search application design meets business objectives
Your search application effectively meets functional/technical requirements
Best practices for indexing, searching and performance are utilized

article.p: Tokenizer Inc. consulting services can cost effectively and rapidly analyze, troubleshoot and recommend fixes for complex search issues that arise from changes to your application or the content you are searching. Specific areas that benefit from such diagnostic assessment can include:

ul.li: Advanced search functions such as spellchecking, faceting, "more-like-this", autosuggest/as-you-type

article.p: Tokenizer search experts can perform a periodic assessment of your Lucene/Solr based application, to help you ensure know that your application is performing optimally to meet your business objectives. To deliver optimum performance for search effectiveness, your dedicated Lucene/Solr Expert Consultant will:

ul.li: Analyze and optimize Query response times
Verify accuracy and performance of data analysis and transformation

article.p: Once you have completed a technical briefing with our engagement team, we will work with you to formulate a recommended approach to identifying your needs and requirements, and translating them into key focus areas. A typical engagement runs 5-7 days, not all consecutive, performed remotely to reduce your costs and accelerate the time you need to implement recommended improvements. Within these engagements, you can expect our experts to cover one or more of the following:

At the conclusion of the engagement, Tokenizer Inc. delivers a thorough architectural design report with recommendations tailored to your specific needs and environment. Implementation of the recommendations and optimizations is performed by your software development staff; if need be, we can recommend a certified Tokenizer Inc. development partner to assist with implementation work as your require. Note that Tokenizer Inc. does not offer consulting on an ad-hoc hourly basis.

Many customers discover that the set of recommendations and assessments produced for their initial consulting agreement are only the first step in an ongoing effort to keep their search environment current with their marketplace and technology needs. For those who understand that effective search requires continuous tuning and evaluation, Tokenizer Inc. offers ExpertLink, an annual subscription which includes a package of consulting hours that serves as a continuation of your initial project engagement. ExpertLink also includes a support packages, available at various service levels, to assist you with responding to specific issues that emerge during development, deployment and in production.

To determine which consulting package is best suited for your situation, please contact Tokenizer Inc. to arrange an initial requirements assessment. Once the discovery session is completed, Tokenizer Inc. will propose the consulting package for services and on-going support that best meet your needs and requirements.
